2.0.name: wordpress/diverse-group-tag-cloud
2.0.description:
The Diverse Group Tag Cloud plugin is designed to construct a tag cloud using a diverse group of information sources such as a list of blogs. It is most useful on blogs that have a number of contributors.

The plugin is currently being used by the Libraries Interact blog to provide the THALI-Tags page.

More information is available on the Diverse Group Tag Cloud plugin homepage.
